overview_of_class: Course Description: Single and multiple degree-of-freedom systems subjected to periodic, seismic, and general loadings. Time-history analysis of linear and nonlinear systems Design methods for earthquakes.
name: Structural Analysis-Dynamics
title: MEAS CIV_ENV 320-0-20 Structural Analysis-Dynamics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Course Description: Single and multiple degree-of-freedom systems subjected to periodic, seismic, and general loadings. Time-history analysis of linear and nonlinear systems Design methods for earthquakes.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prereq: CIV_ENV 221, Theory of Structures I

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Three 1-hour lectures each week; One computer lab section each week (1 and 1/2 hours)

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Dynamics of Structures: Theory and Applications to Earthquake Engineering / Chopra, Anil / ISBN 9780134555126 / 2017 / 5th / Prentice Hall

subject: CIV_ENV
